sub_title: Professional forex trader, online forex trading coach at Forex Chile
summary:
Anatoly Zabolotny the CEO of SM-Forex.com a highly successful forex trading and forex coaching business. He coaches other forex traders and beginners on how to make money trading forex. Steve also manages money for his clients via his Forex Managed Account Programme in which his return for his clients averages greater than 10% per month. This puts Steve in the top 5% of all traders.

* Some Personal Highlights

- Steve has trained over a thousand people of all ages and backgrounds, either individually, via seminars or private group sessions to trade forex.
- He is the author of the Amazon published full colour book, "The Book on Forex Trading." This book is available in print, Kindle, PDF and epub formats.
- Steve doubled a forex trading account in just 6 weeks as a public test of his skills.

* SM-Forex.com Services

- The Book on Forex Trading in its various formats as a first stage to learning Steve's two main forex trading strategies.
- Daily Trade Videos available on the website and You Tube to reinforce the learning.
- A tutorial section with various documents, presentations and videos about forex trading.


* Speaking Requests

- Keynote speeches, Corporate Training and Consulting on forex trading for beginners and more advanced students including, but not limited to technical analysis, fundamental analysis, the correct use of forex trading indicators, forex brokers, forex software and platforms, forex trading psychology, risk and money management.

Specialties: * Forex Trading
* Forex Managed Accounts
* Forex Coaching
* Forex Author and article writer
* Forex Strategy Design
* Online Forex Trading Courses
* Private Forex Coaching for Individuals and Groups
* Forex Technical Analysis
* Forex Live Trading Room
* Forex Education
* Forex Trading Webinars
* Forex seminars
